description: The restarting of the Isle of Man's heritage railways will create a "holiday feel", a minister says.
title: Isle of Man heritage railways reopening brings 'degree of normality'
title_page: Isle of Man heritage railways reopening brings 'degree of normality' - BBC News
maintext: The partial reopening of the Isle of Man heritage railways will bring a "degree of normality" to the summer season, the infrastructure minister has said.
